en.title: Playing Video Games
en.description: I spend most of my gaming time playing Counter-Strike and similar competitive games.

es.title: Igranje video igara
es.description: Većinu vremena provodim igrajući Counter-Strike i slične takmičarske igre.

en.title: Personal Projects
en.description: I enjoy turning development ideas into real projects and continuously experimenting with new tech.

es.title: Lični projekti
es.description: Volim da pretvaram ideje u stvarne projekte i stalno eksperimentišem s novim tehnologijama.

en.title: Embedded Devices
en.description: Learning and experimenting with Arduino, IoT, and low-level programming to explore the world of embedded systems.

es.title: Ugradni uređaji
es.description: Učim i eksperimentišem sa Arduinom, IoT-om i niskonivou programiranjem kako bih istražio svijet ugradnih sistema.

en.title: AI & Machine Learning
en.description: Exploring artificial intelligence, machine learning, and data science to build a strong foundation in future-focused technologies.

es.title: AI i mašinsko učenje
es.description: Istražujem vještačku inteligenciju, mašinsko učenje i nauku o podacima kako bih izgradio čvrstu osnovu u tehnologijama budućnosti.

en.title: Frontend Frameworks
en.description: Diving into modern JavaScript frameworks like Vue, React, and Angular to create dynamic, responsive web applications.

es.title: Frontend okviri
es.description: Proučavam moderne JavaScript okvire poput Vue, React i Angular za kreiranje dinamičnih, responzivnih web aplikacija.

en.title: Building Computers
en.description: Enjoy building custom PCs tailored to individual specs, combining performance, reliability, and user preference.

es.title: Sklapanje računara
es.description: Volim da sastavljam računare po mjeri, kombinujući performanse, pouzdanost i lične preferencije.

en.title: Program Design Patterns
en.description: Learning and applying software design patterns to improve backend structure, maintainability, and scalability.

es.title: Obrasci dizajna softvera
es.description: Učim i primjenjujem obrasce dizajna softvera kako bih poboljšao strukturu pozadinskog sistema, održavanje i skalabilnost.
